930d8838-ddba-11e6-bf26-cec0c932ce01.name: Shallow water 1
930d8838-ddba-11e6-bf26-cec0c932ce01.desc: Set the alarm on if the speed is greater than 5knt and the depth is less than 4.5m

events.name: Shallow water
events.desc: Activate an alert if the depth is lower than 4.5 meters and the speed is higher than 5 knt

params.title: Shallow water!
params.message: You are in a shallow water area, reduce your speed to 5knt or less.

b5660928-e24c-11e6-bf01-fe55135034f3.name: Heavy wind 1
b5660928-e24c-11e6-bf01-fe55135034f3.desc: Set the alarm on if the speed of the wind is more than 20knts from NE

events.name: Heavy Winds
events.desc: Activate an alert if the winds are strong blowing in the NE sector
